titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Lewatit.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 9/7/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on Ion-exchange resins (cationic H form), consisting of copolymers of acrylic acid and diethylene glycol divinyl ether (Lewatit).
